Table of Contents

Name

nemokeys - display value of NEMO’s output-keys

Synopsis

nemokeys key=key1[,key2,...] ...

Description

nemokeys displays the values of NEMO’s output-keys (see also outparam(3NEMO) ). They are useful to store single (or small array) named variables, as defined by NEMO programs.

Parameters

The following parameters are recognized.
key=key1,key2,...
Keyword(s) to look the value up for. No default.

See Also

outparam(3NEMO) , getparam(3NEMO) , tsf(1NEMO) , filestruct(3NEMO) .

Author

Peter Teuben ?
